attributes.additional_details:
My father is currently incarcerated in an Indonesian Jail since August 2010 after being coerced to go there by threats to his family.
I have received a Prisoner Transfer Agreement from the Ministry of Justice and now need help to actually put this into place to get him back to the UK as he will not survive over there with no money or medicine for his condition Diabetes Type1.
I have paid his medical funds and food and rent to the jail since this all started and now have no money left to do so which now means he will die if no aid is given.
Jack Walker needs to be back in the UK to serve his sentence here and get the health care he needs to survive.
We have the agreement now please help by signing this petition so the government can help us to get him back home.
Many thanks
H.Walker
